constants.WELCOME: Assalomu Aleykum! Men Transformers Education o'quv markazining hizmat botiman. Men sizga har hil datchiklar haqida malumot,narx-navo va o'quv manbalar berishim mumkin. Shunchaki biror datchik, modul yoki plata nomini kiriting.
constants.NOT_FOUND: Afsuski, siz qidirayotgan tovar tugab qolgan yoki bizga hali yetib kelmagan.
constants.ERROR: Nimadir noto'g'ri ketdi, iltimos qayta urunib ko'ring yoki birozdan keyin urunib ko'ring!
constants.TEMPLATE: {} mavjud. U haqida: ID: {} Narxi: {} Soni: {} Ma'lumot: {} To'liq ma'lumot bu yerda

products.name: arduino nano
products.short_info: Arduino Nano - Arduino platalar oilasiga mansub bir kontroller. Atmega328p-u mikrokontrollerida, 8 yoki 16hz chastotada ishlaydi

products.name: arduino uno
products.short_info: Arduino Uno - Arduino platalar oilasiga mansub bir kontroller. Atmega328p-u mikrokontrollerida, 16hz chastotada ishlaydi

products.name: lcd display
products.short_info: LCD display - bu kichik bir ekrancha, u yordamida har hil matn malumot, yoki binary media chiqarishingiz mumkin

products.name: servo motor
products.short_info: Servo motor - bu burilish burchagini sozlash imkoniyatiga ega kichik bir motorcha

products.name: stepper motor
products.short_info: Siz bergan qadam boyicha aylanadigan motor
